description: The requisition IDs that are attached to the batch.

columns.name: BATCH_NUMBER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the batch.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The requisition IDs that are included in the batch.

columns.name: REQ_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: REQ_RQG_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition grouper patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the RQG_DB_MAIN table.
